## ProgramBuilder.uintBitsToFloat() method

Same as uintBitsToFloat builtin function in GLSL, only valid for WebGL2 device and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
uintBitsToFloat(x: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```
